body_html:
@ngimel Is this error due to a NCCL and CUDA version mismatch?
https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test1/1340/console
?

Which CUDA version of NCCL will apt-get install libnccl2 install ?
